name: Belimadh's Space
description:
Explore the universe. Brand new system every time! Gather, fight and upgrade. Can you prevent Belimadht's awakening?

KEY FEATURES:

-Randomized self-generated space.

-Open world(Space).

-Scalable difficulty.

-Addictive Android space Gameplay.

-No Ads.

-Free for all.

-alot of comming updates.

COMMING UPDATES

-Upgrade System for the spaceship.

-Weapon system

-Coop System

-Quest System.
